Update sbmember set m_pw = #{pw}, m_name = #{name}, m_nick = #{nick}, m_address = #{addr}, m_phone = #{phone} where m_email = #{email}
mapper.select: select m_email as email, m_pw as pw, m_name as name, m_nick as nick, m_address as addr, m_phone as phone from sbmember where m_nick=#{nick}
mapper.insert: insert into sbmember( m_no, m_email , m_pw , m_name , m_nick , m_address , m_phone ) values( sbmember_seq.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{addr}, #{phone} )
